bio:
We are a team of experienced web designers and web developers working in this field for the last 10+ years. We are capable to provide your desired website based on your design and choice. We have designed numerous wordpress websites in the past, we can even write custom plugins, themes in WordPress & also have expertise in troubleshooting for wordpress websites.

Why hire me?

You get the 30 days after Completion Support.
Unlimited revision
100% satisfaction
100% work according to your requirement.

DESIGN PHASE:
>The first thing I need is your LOGO as some of the color preference of the website will be based on your LOGO. If you don’t have any I can create one for you. You will get UNLIMITED modifications until you are fully satisfied.
>After approval of the logo I will start designing the home page.
>The initial sample will be provided within one business day.
>I will provide you UNLIMITED modifications for the design. 
>After approval of the home pages I will design the inner pages.
>You will also get UNLIMITED modifications for them until you are fully satisfied.

DEVELOPMENT PHASE:
After complete approval of the design I will go for the development part.
>A CMS part will be provided so that admin can change, add and remove any content, images and pages of the website.
>Admin can add new services, modify it or remove it as necessary.
>Admin will get a notification every time when a user submits the ‘contact form’.
 
Some other features which I will provide for your website-
>Cross browser compatibility will be provided along with various devices like iphone, ipad, and mobile compatible.
>Optimized images will be used for faster loading.
> Regarding SEO features, I will keep Meta tags, Meta description, and Meta keywords.
